title: The Beach
episode_desc: Shy college student Nasir Khan spends the night with a quirky, mysterious girl, and is horrified when he awakens to find she has been murdered.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: Subtle Beast
episode_desc: As attorney Jack Stone counsels Naz, lead detective Dennis Box investigates the crime.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: A Dark Crate
episode_desc: Awaiting his formal arraignment at Rikers Island, Naz realizes that his survival, or perhaps his demise, rests with an inmate named Freddy Knight, while Stone is double crossed.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: The Art of War
episode_desc: A fellow prisoner advises Naz on prison life while he weighs the pros and cons of copping a plea, and Stone delves into Andrea's past.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: The Season of the Witch
episode_desc: Box reconstructs Naz's whereabouts on the night of Andrea's death, Stone looks into other potential suspects, and Naz is pulled further into the murkiness of prison life.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: Samson and Delilah
episode_desc: As prosecutor Helen Weiss prepares for trial, Chandra follows a potential new lead, and Naz's alliance with Freddy deepens.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: Ordinary Death
episode_desc: As the defense presents its case, Box's actions on the night of the murder are called into question, and tragedy strikes at Rikers.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.

title: The Call of the Wild
episode_desc: A controversy surrounding the defense puts Stone in the spotlight as Naz's trial reaches its climax.
show_desc: After a night of partying with a woman he picked up, a man wakes up to find her stabbed to death and is charged with her murder.
